text: Tomoya Ochiai is a basketball player from Japan. Ochiai competed at the 2020 Summer Olympics.Tomoya OCHIAI He was born on 18 June 1987.Tomoya Ochiai == References == Category:1987 births Category:Living people Category:3x3 basketball players Category:Forwards (basketball) Category:Japanese basketball players Category:Olympians for Japan Category:Sportspeople from Tokyo
title: Tomoya Ochiai
